item.description:
Hi Incubators!

This week we will prove that Improv indeed does exist and crash landed here long before Roswell. I am such a dork sometimes, I hope you all appreciate.

I look forward to seeing you this week! Bring your usual pep if you are regular and if you are coming for the first time if you forget your pep we'll do our earnest best to drag it out of you. Come smile, laugh, relax, and most importantly play! No improv experience required. We are open and supportive of everyone!! Bring a friend along!

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: I(ncubator)-FIles: I want to improv!!!!
